DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Men , 18 year age old , bothersome urinary symptom Able speak , read understand English Subject anyone household currently employ marketing marketing research company , advertise agency public relation firm , pharmacy pharmaceutical company , manufacturer medicine , manage care health insurance company , certify license healthcare professional healthcare practice Has participate clinical trial last 12 month Willing sign inform consent/HIPPA form willing able provide contact information Exclusion criterion : Allergy tamsulosin hydrochloride sulpha drug Report current use medication list `` Do use '' section Drug Facts Label ( DFL ) Choose purchase study product Do provide consent sign HIPPA form Do provide contact information
